subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: After three tepid victories, the No. 13 Huskies finally delivered a commanding performance to beat a sloppy L.S.U. team in a semifinal of the N.I.T. Season Tip-Off.
snippet: After three tepid victories, the No. 13 Huskies finally delivered a commanding performance to beat a sloppy L.S.U. team in a semifinal of the N.I.T. Season Tip-Off.
